::: RATT RAP ::: Ah, Megatron, where are we going?

::: MEGATRON, not turning his crimsom eyes away from the blurry scenery  said 
::: To the plains. There we shall find shelter in a large sub terranian caver 
that I had scouted out some time ago. Im sure its still there....

::: RAT TRAP lookes to QUICKSTRIKE ::: Well, I hope the roach will be 
ok....hes our decoy, our human shield! hahahaha!

::: MEGATRON groans and continues onward. The spedder buzzes over the grass 
:::
